spatial_accuracy.notes: Major failures in staircase interpretation and room layout. The central staircase is replaced by a solid wall and hallway. Room proportions in the Dining area and Playroom are significantly distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: The primary staircase (UP/DN) is entirely missing as a functional element. The central pantry area is hallucinated as an open counter. External bay window geometry is simplified into flat walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island and sink placement approximately match positions but lack architectural scale. Hallucinated furniture blobs appear in the living area where clear floor space was indicated.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and clay-render aesthetic. Isometric camera angle is correctly applied. However, geometry 'melts' in complex corners (E6).

detected_errors.description: Completely missing staircase structure and associated railings/steps.
Central pantry walls transformed from an enclosed room into an open L-shaped counter.
Hallucinated architectural divider in the living room area not present on the plan.
Dining room bay window projection is flattened and reduced in width relative to the living room span.
Melting wall geometry near the W/C and foyer closet area.
Kitchen counter orientation simplified, losing the specific sink/stove relationship indicated in CAD blocks.
